name: part_010
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ4周年記念LIVE】Special Thank U!! J Medley 【3DLIVE】 [APbMhuPbwkE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa introduces her new song "S.T.Y." and explains its meaning as an abbreviation.
Tokoyami Towa thanks the audience and says goodbye after the performance.
An informational screen detailing the release of the CD single for "S.T.Y." with voiceover.

subtitles.original: 是非チェックをよろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: Please be sure to check it out.

subtitles.original: はい、S.T.Y.っていうのはね、何かの略なんです。
subtitles.english: Yes, "S.T.Y." is an abbreviation for something.

subtitles.original: えー、こちらのね、何の略かといういうのは歌詞の中に...
subtitles.english: As for what it's an abbreviation for, in the lyrics...

subtitles.original: ...答えが載ってるかもしれない。
subtitles.english: ...the answer might be in there.

subtitles.original: というか、すでに答えが載ってるかもしれない。
subtitles.english: Actually, the answer might already be out there.

subtitles.original: まあそんなことはいいんだけど、考えながら聴いてくれれば嬉しいです。
subtitles.english: Well, anyway, I'd be happy if you listened while thinking about it.

subtitles.original: それでは聴いてください、S.T.Y.。
subtitles.english: Now, please listen: "S.T.Y."

subtitles.original: そっと振り返った奇跡　どうしたって光って
subtitles.english: The miracle I quietly looked back on, no matter what, it shines

subtitles.original: ありふれた君がいつだってスーパーヒーロー
subtitles.english: The ordinary you is always a superhero

subtitles.original: ハ！ハ！ハ！ハ！
subtitles.english: Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha!

subtitles.original: いつもポンコツだった私　飛べなくて未完成
subtitles.english: I was always a klutz, unable to fly and incomplete

subtitles.original: アヒルなのはアヒルのままかもねなんてさ
subtitles.english: Thinking that maybe a duck will just stay a duck

subtitles.original: らしさなんて放っておいて　君となんかちょっと似ていて
subtitles.english: Forget about "being myself", I'm somewhat like you

subtitles.original: デコボコだからジャストに噛み合うパズルピース
subtitles.english: Because we're uneven, we fit perfectly like puzzle pieces

subtitles.original: 繋げたい　繋ぎたい　届かない言葉も
subtitles.english: I want to connect, I want to join, even words that don't reach

subtitles.original: いつかは誰かの何かに成りたいから
subtitles.english: Because someday I want to become something to someone

subtitles.original: crazy No lazy 夢の中
subtitles.english: crazy No lazy, in the middle of a dream

subtitles.original: 夢を見せて
subtitles.english: Show me a dream

subtitles.original: Always going 何千回　何万回　膝をついても
subtitles.english: Always going, thousands, tens of thousands of times, even if I fall to my knees

subtitles.original: 最大級 I love you で立ち上がれるから
subtitles.english: Because I can stand up with a maximum-level "I love you"

subtitles.original: とびっきりオーバーな S.T.Y.
subtitles.english: A super extraordinary S.T.Y.

subtitles.original: 消えそうなハッピーも勇気も振り絞っちゃって
subtitles.english: Squeezing out every bit of fading happiness and courage

subtitles.original: 大失敗も後悔さえ愛せるなら
subtitles.english: If I can even love big failures and regrets

subtitles.original: 背中には君という羽
subtitles.english: Then on my back, I have wings called "you"

subtitles.original: ハ！ハ！ハ！ハ！
subtitles.english: Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha!

subtitles.original: チクタク追い越して　いつもどこか乾いた焦燥感
subtitles.english: Overtaking the tick-tock, always a dry sense of impatience somewhere

subtitles.original: 隣で走る君と織り成すブレイブストーリー
subtitles.english: A brave story woven together with you running beside me

subtitles.original: Non-fiction
subtitles.english: Non-fiction

subtitles.original: 君の色が私を塗り替えて
subtitles.english: Your color repaints me

subtitles.original: 壊れかけの音で響くから
subtitles.english: Because it resonates with a nearly broken sound

subtitles.original: おとぎ話の続きをまだ描きたいんだよ
subtitles.english: I still want to draw the continuation of the fairy tale

subtitles.original: Palette Palette 連れて行くよ
subtitles.english: Palette Palette, I'll take you with me

subtitles.original: きっと何千回　何万回...
subtitles.english: Surely thousands, tens of thousands of times...

subtitles.original: きっと何千回　何万回
subtitles.english: Surely thousands, tens of thousands of times

subtitles.original: Always going 何千回　何万回　迷い込んでも
subtitles.english: Always going, thousands, tens of thousands of times, even if I get lost

subtitles.original: 最大級 I love you な君がいるから
subtitles.english: Because there's a maximum-level "I love you" version of you

subtitles.original: 弾丸ノバシャルな S.T.Y.
subtitles.english: A bullet-like special S.T.Y.

subtitles.original: それでもってラッキーも運命も手繰り寄せて
subtitles.english: And then, pulling in both luck and destiny

subtitles.original: もうバイバイも涙も怖くないよ
subtitles.english: I'm no longer afraid of goodbyes or tears

subtitles.original: 飛べなかった私のこの背中には君という羽
subtitles.english: On this back of mine that couldn't fly, I have wings called "you"

subtitles.original: バイバーイ！
subtitles.english: Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: 5周年目もよろしくねー！
subtitles.english: Please support me in my 5th year too!

subtitles.original: またねー！
subtitles.english: See you later!

subtitles.original: 常闇トワ4周年記念ライブ、スペシャルサンキュージェーメドレー、いかがだったでしょうか？
subtitles.english: How was the Tokoyami Towa 4th Anniversary Live: Special Thank U J-Medley?

subtitles.original: ライブタイトルは先ほど披露いたしました、buzzGさん作詞作曲の「S.T.Y.」とかけて決めました。
subtitles.english: The live title was chosen as a play on "S.T.Y.", written and composed by buzzG, which I just performed.

subtitles.original: いつもみんなありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you everyone, as always!

subtitles.original: こちらの「S.T.Y.」と合わせて、ホロライブオリジナル曲「至上主義アドトラック」常闇トワカバーバージョンが、CDシングルとして発売いたします！
subtitles.english: Together with "S.T.Y.", the Hololive original song "Shijou Shugi Adtruck" Tokoyami Towa cover version will be released as a CD single!

subtitles.original: 概要欄を更新してみて確認してみてください。
subtitles.english: Please check the description box for updates.
